headline: CORRECTING and REPLACING Eversource Energy Declares Common Dividend
summary: HARTFORD, Conn. & BOSTON, December 03, 2025--Record date in first paragraph of release should read: ...as of the close of business on December 17, 2025. (instead of ...as of the close of business on December 15, 2025).
